db:query-single.db:sql: SELECT app.start_time,app.end_time,app.symptoms, app.date,patient.first_name as patient_first_name, patient.last_name as patient_last_name, patient.email as patient_email, patient.phone_number as patient_phone, doctor.first_name as doctor_first_name, doctor.last_name as doctor_last_name ,doctor.email as doctor_email,doctor.phone_number as doctor_phone FROM appointments app LEFT JOIN users patient ON patient.id = app.user_id LEFT JOIN users doctor ON doctor.id = app.doctor_id WHERE app.appointment_id= :appointment_id
